name: Superhero Car Merge Master
description:
Merge your superhero cars to go into battle and get the biggest army on the block with the aim of merging all the cars to have enough power to fight against the enemies?

You need use your tactic and your brain to combine the superhero cars and fight against the enemies! You need quickly synthesize your superhero cars to become a giant army if you want to win!

Superhero Car Merge Master is an attractive and addictive real-time strategy game for everyone. The main goal is to beat all the enemies by combining your superhero cars to grow from the simple. Combine quickly and actively attack enemies to gain control of enemy positions and possess greater power than the opponent. At the same time, use your strategy and tactics to win the battle and move on to the next level. Unlock new and more powerful superhero cars merging them! Grow your army to fight against terrific superhero cars when you merge them.

This game is not one of those classic and boring merging games. This is a new, free, attractive and cool game for all of us.

FEATURE:
Beautiful 3D graphics
Free game
Fun and addictive gameplay
Easy controls
For kids and adults
Various monsters to merge

HOW TO PLAY:
Merge your troops to grow your powers.
Merge into a story monsters troop fight against giant and terrifying enemies.
Merge as quick as possible, and fight all the enemies.
Be brave and face the battle and become the strongest army.

Enjoy Superhero Car Merge Master - a magic merge game for you!
